title: MAG 175 - Epoch Transcript-converted
text:
we're going, the, uh... the next domain, I-I've been meaning to 
tell you, but it's— well. 

The Magnus Archives – MAG 175 – Epoch 
17 
MARTIN 
Spit it out, John. 
ARCHIVIST 
Basira and Daisy. We're close. 
MARTIN 
Wait, what? Wait, really?! B— th-that's brilliant; what are we waiting for; let's 
go! 
ARCHIVIST 
I-uh-yeah, i-it's, it's not, it’s not going to be easy, things aren't… Good. 
MARTIN 
(Fast, sarcastic) Oh my goodness, really? And here was me thinking the 
apocalypse was going oh, so swimmingly! 
ARCHIVIST 
Yes, alright, I just meant— 
MARTIN 
I, I know what you meant! I can still be keen to see our (slight laugh) friends! 
ARCHIVIST 
True. 
MARTIN 
Besides, we can help them now. 

The Magnus Archives – MAG 175 – Epoch 
18 
[Martin starts walking] 
(The Archivist sighs) 
ARCHIVIST 
Yeah. 
Yeah. 
[The Archivist follows] 
[Tape clicks off] 
[The Magnus Archives Theme – Outro] 
JONATHAN SIMS

Licence. Today's episode was written by Jonathan Sims, produced by Lowri Ann 
Davies, and directed by Alexander J Newall. It featured: Jonathan Sims as The 
Archivist and Alexander J Newall as Martin Blackwood. To subscribe, buy 
merchandise, or join our Patreon, visit rustyquill.com. Rate and review us 
online, tweet us at TheRustyQuill, visit us on Facebook, or email us via
